messages.text:
```text = df2f[
            df2f[Symbol("Indicator Name")] .== yaxis_column_name,
            Symbol("Country Name"),
        ],```
should be
```text = df2f[
            df2f[!,Symbol("Indicator Name")] .== yaxis_column_name,
            Symbol("Country Name"),
        ],```
